General.Name: Zhongjie (Jiangsu) Technology Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Zhongjie (Jiangsu) Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of automotive parts for automotive industries in China and internationally. The company offers automotive shock absorption components that are used in automotive chassis systems, engine systems, body systems and other systems. It also provides exhaust, steering, brake, door, seat, parking mechanism, control axis, EMU, and plastic parts; flange plates, handbrake tooth plates, fine blanking gear blanks and shift forks, ring gears, aluminum shift forks, aluminum profiles, and die-castings. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Wuxi, China.

1.Name: Mr. Yefei  Zhang
1.Title: CFO, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Director
